definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 車份|车份[che1 fen4]

sentences.english: I must have my share in the conversation, if you are speaking of music.
sentences.chinese: 要是你们谈音乐，就得有我的份儿。

sentences.english: And for God’s sake don’t reveal whom you love.
sentences.chinese: 看在上帝的份儿上，也不要告诉别人你爱的是谁。

sentences.english: Then the class recreational activities, will not have me out.
sentences.chinese: 那时班上的文娱活动，都不会有我的份儿。

sentences.english: Such highly - paid jobs are out of his reach.
sentences.chinese: 这类报答高的工作没有他的份儿。

sentences.english: I'll be 75 and hanging around bars yacking it up.
sentences.chinese: 我快75岁了，就只剩蹲酒吧嗑闲的份儿了。

sentences.english: In these discussions, Joe bore no part.
sentences.chinese: 凡是这类讨论乔是没有份儿的。

definition: (in the expression 看在…的份上) for the sake of .../considering ...
a couple of times/to repeat the same/the same old trick/tricks of the trade
through road/way out/way to survive/means of subsistence
to tackle a difficult job (idiom)/to do sth reluctantly
to take a beating/to get thrashed/to come under attack
ashamed/embarrassed/not having the face (to meet people)/not daring (out of shame)
(of a child) well-behaved/obediently/(term of endearment for a child) darling/sweetie
to accept misfortunes as decreed by fate/to be resigned to sth
